seo.title: Software Developer from Bruges, Belgium | Webdevamin
seo.description: I provide digital solutions for your business with focus on your needs. Web design, web development, SEO and more. Contact me to boost your business online.

hero.summary: I'm a software developer from Bruges, Belgium.

about.title: Who am I
about.text: I provide digital solutions for your business for example a website, web application, etc. Excelling at web- and mobile development, web design, SEO and digital marketing with focus on your needs. Satisfied many customers with excellent software delivery. My motto: Keep it concise with words, deliver state-of-art applications. In case you have any questions or need a digital solution (for example a website), don't hesitate to contact me.
